text: Matthew or Matt Scott may refer to: *Matt Scott (American football) (born 1990), American football quarterback *Matt Scott (basketball) (born 1985), American wheelchair basketball player *Matt Scott (musician), musician with Chevelle *Matt Scott (rugby union) (born 1990), Scottish rugby union player *Matt Scott (sports journalist), British sports journalist *Matthew P. Scott, development biologist *Matthew Scott (cricketer) (born 1979), former English cricketer *Matthew Scott (footballer, born 1872) (1872–?), Scottish footballer (Airdrieonians FC and Scotland) *Matthew Scott (footballer, born 1867) (1867–1897), English footballer for Sunderland *Matthew Scott (rugby league) (born 1985), Australian rugby league footballer *Matthew Scott (Stargate), fictional character in Stargate Universe *Matthew T. Scott (1828–1891), agriculturist *Matthew Scott (police commissioner), English police commissioner ==See also== *
title: Matthew Scott
